flow.name: lookUpCountryFlow

scripting:component.doc:name: Get Country in Workday
scripting:component.scripting:script:
def country = payload.toUpperCase() def countryInWDAY = country
println "Country to lookup is: " + country switch (country) { case ["US","USA"]: countryInWDAY = "USA" break case ["UK", "GBR"]: countryInWDAY = "GBR" break } return countryInWDAY

flow.doc:description: The script uses data in the state field to add a region to the payload according to location.
flow.name: lookUpCountryRegionFlow

scripting:component.doc:name: Get Country region in Workday
scripting:component.scripting:script:
def region = payload.toUpperCase() def regionInWDAY = region
println "Country region to lookup is: " + region switch (region) { case ["USA-CA"]: regionInWDAY = "USA-CA" break case ["ILLINOIS"]: regionInWDAY = "Illinois" break } return regionInWDAY
